title: RA Sushi Happy Hour includes sushi, appetizers, beer, sake, wine and cocktails
statement: RA Sushi's Happy Hour menu includes sushi rolls, nigiri, small plates, hot and cold appetizers, draft and bottled beer, sake, wine, and cocktails.
